contentfulProduct.seoDescription: This cashmere sweater dress is a new favorite. Made from 100 Grade A Mongolian cashmere - it's the perfect combination of soft, warm & lightweight. It'll keep you cozy all fall and winter long.
contentfulProduct.title: Mongolian Cashmere Textured Sweater Dress

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10
This cashmere sweater dress is a new favorite. Made from 100% Grade A Mongolian cashmere - it's the perfect combination of soft, warm & lightweight. It'll keep you cozy all fall and winter long.
Material: rare, 100% Grade A Mongolian cashmere; 15.1 micron thickness, 34-36mm super long fiber length
Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
Length: Above the knee. Size Small is 35.5 inches
Fit: Relaxed and slightly oversized. Consider sizing down
All over fisherman rib stitch detailing
Mock-neck mini sweater dress
Dropped shoulder seams
Origin: cashmere sourced from Hircus goats in Inner Mongolia
Model is 5'9" and wearing the textured sweater dress in a size Small

Hand wash using cold water and neutral soap or baby shampoo. Rinse out without rubbing and lay flat to dry at room temperature, avoiding sunlight. Iron at low temperature, using pressing cloth. Do not bleach. If you prefer to dry clean, please ask for delicate detergent.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: rare, 100% Grade A Mongolian cashmere; 15.1 micron thickness, 34-36mm super long fiber length
  • Read our Cashmere 101 to learn more about cashmere, its origin, and how to care for it
  • Length: Above the knee. Size Small is 35.5 inches
  • Fit: Relaxed and slightly oversized. Consider sizing down
  • All over fisherman rib stitch detailing
  • Mock-neck mini sweater dress
  • Dropped shoulder seams
  • Origin: cashmere sourced from Hircus goats in Inner Mongolia
  • Model is 5'9" and wearing the textured sweater dress in a size Small
